sense.def:
Če človek
argues with someone
, z besedami, včasih tudi jeznimi, pokaže, da se ne strinja z njim.

seg.quote: Don't argue with me, George, just do as you're told.
They were arguing about who should sit in front.

sense.def:
Če človek
argues
, da je nekaj tako, kot trdi, pove, da je po njegovem mnenju tako in navede razloge.

seg.quote: There are those who argue that the existence of nuclear weapons has helped to maintain peace.

sense.def:
Če človek
argues for
ali
argues against something
, navede razloge, zakaj bi se tisto moralo ali ne smelo zgoditi.

seg.quote: Some politicians argued against giving women the vote.
